function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Behavioral changes due to the COVID-19 crisis affecting entrepreneurship","Impact":"Decreased entrepreneurial activity and potential stunted economic growth","Mitigation":"Support for entrepreneurship through government policies and financial assistance","Technologies":"","People":"Entrepreneurs, SMEs","Owner":"Government, policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of supportive infrastructure for entrepreneurship (universities, science parks, incubators)","Impact":"Barriers to entrepreneurial development and growth","Mitigation":"Investment in infrastructure, resource allocation, and strategic partnerships","Technologies":"","People":"Entrepreneurs, university researchers, incubator managers","Owner":"Government, private investors, university administration"},{"Description":"Inadequate empirical research on the impact of policy responses on SME resilience and entrepreneurial capacity","Impact":"Lack of evidence-based policymaking for SME resilience and growth","Mitigation":"Conducting comparative or cross-sectional studies, funding research initiatives, collaboration with academic institutions","Technologies":"Research methodologies, data analysis tools","People":"Policy makers, researchers, academics","Owner":"Government, academic institutions, funding organizations"}]}
